Description: Part of a quartzite rectangular sculpture; cornice at the top above a relief panel depicting four(remaining) goddesses; incised representation of a female figure to the right; incised Hieroglyphic text above and below and on the side.
Curator's comments: Joins with Hannover 1935.200.226, to make a shrine with seven high-relief depictions of standing Hathor. See Raue, in Studies in Honor of Ali Radwan (SASAE 34): 247-61.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2016 - 2017, Dec - Jun, Karlsruhe, Badisches Landesmuseum, Ramesses
